name: Beating the performance gap - regulate or educate?
description: As building regulations approach, economic and practical limits ensuring what is designed delivers on the ground becomes crucial. This is a debate on how this could be achieved.

speakers.name: Rt. Hon. Don Foster
speakers.occupation: MP, Parliamentary Under Secretary of State, Department for Communities and Local Government

speakers.name: John Tebbit
speakers.occupation: Deputy Chief Executive, Construction Products Association (CPA)

speakers.name: Bill Bordass
speakers.occupation: Research & Policy Adviser, Usable Buildings Trust
